channel.title: ReRelease(Grimreaperscape v1.4)
channel.description:
This in fact, is the first source I have ever made. Using it I have learned how to efficiently use: autospawn.java, client.java, player.java, npchandler.java, and shops.cfg.
I hope it have the same effect on you. I used the figmentscape source. Important things I've fixed from the figmentscape source: -Ipban(Wrote a command and a new bufferwriter for it. -Owner recognition(Before if you set your player rights to 3 it would think you were an admin) -I fixed the starter glitch where you could get as much starters as you wanted. -anti SYI/Null -NO MORE MEMBERS! Pictures:
Home: [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/11iiljd.jpg[/img]
Training Dungeon: [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/8x5z0h.jpg[/img]
Barrows: [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/zmgs9f.jpg[/img]
Multi: [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/29olkpv.jpg[/img]
Real Tzhaar caves: [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2u6fry9.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/21otque.jpg[/img]
Dl Link:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=RJGQ6ZZD
Credits: 75% figment 20% me(for making it into a more stable server and adding things (great for 24/7 hosting)). 5%(Mopar tuts like Jeremy368's newbie tut)
Remember. This is my first source, and is a great learning experience for new programmers.
Please comment.

This in fact, is the first source I have ever made. Using it I have learned how to efficiently use: autospawn.java, client.java, player.java, npchandler.java, and shops.cfg.

I hope it have the same effect on you. I used the figmentscape source.
Important things I’ve fixed from the figmentscape source:
-Ipban(Wrote a command and a new bufferwriter for it.
-Owner recognition(Before if you set your player rights to 3 it would think you were an admin)
